qas.question: Which award did Popper receive from the American Political Science Association?
What recognition did Austria bestow on Popper in 1986?

answers.text: Grand Decoration of Honour in Gold for Services to the Republic of Austria

qas.question: Who gave Popper its Humanist Laureate Award?
Which central European university made Popper a fellow?
When was Popper knighted by King George?
What honor did Popper never win?

plausible_answers.text: Grand Decoration of Honour in Gold

qas.question: What award did Russia send to Popper?
When was Popper thrown out of the Royal Society?

plausible_answers.text: Insignia of a Companion of Honour

qas.question: What award did Popper lose in 1982?

context: Popper won many awards and honours in his field, including the <a0_0>Lippincott Award<a0_0/> of the American Political Science Association, the <b6_0>Sonning Prize<b6_0/>, the Otto Hahn Peace Medal of the United Nations Association of Germany in Berlin and fellowships in the Royal Society, British Academy, London School of Economics, King's College London, Darwin College, Cambridge, and <a4_0>Charles University, Prague<a4_0/>. Austria awarded him the <a1_0><b7_0>Grand Decoration of Honour in Gold<b7_0/> for Services to the Republic of Austria<a1_0/> in 1986, and the Federal Republic of Germany its Grand Cross with Star and Sash of the Order of Merit, and the peace class of the Order Pour le Mérite. He received the Humanist Laureate Award from the <a2_0>International Academy of Humanism<a2_0/>. He was knighted by <a3_0>Queen Elizabeth II<a3_0/> in <b5_0>1965<b5_0/>, and was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society in <b8_0>1976<b8_0/>. He was invested with the <b9_0>Insignia of a Companion of Honour<b9_0/> in 1982.
